name: Omnitopia
description:
"Omnitopia" is a turn-based JRPG with a twist.

Play up to 6 unique playable scenarios in the first part of the game, before the main plot is opened up and the player becomes free to explore both old and new areas - with a 3-member team this time!

The game's influences range from "Live a Live" to "Octopath Traveler" to "Shin Megami Tensei".

  • Engaging turn-based battles
  • 6 different atmospheres
  • limited inventory & survival elements
  • Side quests & optional content
  • Original soundtrack
  • 3 difficulty modes
  • 20+ hours (demo ~3 hours)
  • Minigames
